item.category: Dead animal in the carriageway or footway

item.title: Nuisance behaviour, 15th August
item.description:
Again this car has come in at unsocialble hours into the allotments at 5:23am banging and crashing the allotment gates disturbing the residents. Access needs to be restricted. Residents have had to put up with this at all unsociable hours over the last few months. It has been hot and so affects us all sleeping without this added issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 297, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
